meta.@content: An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

@value: This is the version of SMAL employed, not of the model.
Download public data using Global Mapper
The published source of classified information, if any, contained in the Metadata.
Lansat7 Global Image Mosaic (Color, Pan-Sharpened, 30m resolution) and SRTM Elevation Data (3 arc-second, 90m resolution)
The specific element which contains the information classifying this document.
The latitude and longitude of the origin point of the model.
Two enumerations, one for spatial reference frame, the other for earth ellipsoid e.g. [GD WE]. See X3D specification 25.2.3.
The axis orientation is positive Y up.
GeoOrigin elements must have a unique ID so that they can be referenced.
Describes the size and shape of the terrain model in two and a half dimensions; vertical extent and a polygonal shape defined by a minimum of three LatLongCoordinates.
Area of the model in sq ft.
Vertical depth of the model in meters from the lowest to the highest point on the model.
A latitude and longitude coordinate pair using the WG84 earth ellipsoid.
A latitude and longitude coordinate pair using the WG84 earth ellipsoid.
